The claim made by President Donald Trump: 2. The unemployment rate of 4.4 percent is indeed tied for the lowest in the past 16 years, going back to June 2001.
The gain of 222: 000 jobs in the June 2017 report is solid, but not the best in 16 years.
Other measurements: such as the ratio of employed people to the population as a whole, remain below pre-Great Recession highs.
